    • FilteredPostsByParam

      public static java.util.ArrayList<FacebookPost> FilteredPostsByParam​(java.util.ArrayList<FacebookPost> array, java.lang.String minLength, java.lang.String maxLength, java.lang.String emoji) throws BadRangeValueException, BadValueException, BadStringException
      It returns the ArrayList that satisfies param's requirements
      Parameters:
      array - the ArrayList to filter
      minLength - the minimum length message of the post
      mmaxLength - the maximum length message of the post
      emoji - for checking if a message contains or not emoji

      the filtered array

      BadRangeValueException
